honors_and_awards.title: Most Influential Global Marketing Leader
honors_and_awards.description: More than 300+ Marketing professionals participated in the award from 150 countries.

honors_and_awards.title: Winner of Asian Customer Engagement Forum Awards 2014 - B2B and Events
honors_and_awards.description: PAUL WRITER has been awarded Silver for Brand Summit and Bronze for HOT 50 Brands Awards in B2B space at 3rd Asian Customer Engagement Forum Awards 2014. Brand Summit and HOT 50 Awards is my brain child designed exclusively for senior level Marketers across the industry segment including the Brand Owners from different cities. Thanks to all my team members who contributed equally in the same without whom this would not have been possible.

honors_and_awards.title: Youth Exchange Program
honors_and_awards.description: Represented state and college on National level at Youth Exchange program conducted by National wing of NCC at Salt lake Stadium Kolkatta. Where our state has been awarded first prize in group dance competition and was the leader of the team in dance competition.
